title: Implementing DevSecOps (LFS262)
overview: This course teaches you how to integrate security into modern DevOps practices. It covers DevSecOps principles, automation of security in CI/CD pipelines, secure infrastructure as code, vulnerability scanning, and compliance monitoring. The course uses real-world tools and practical exercises to help you implement security across your software development lifecycle.
requirements: Familiarity with DevOps workflows and CI/CD
Basic understanding of containers and Kubernetes
Experience with scripting and infrastructure as code tools
audience: Ideal for DevOps engineers, security engineers, SREs, and developers interested in embedding security practices within DevOps pipelines and infrastructure.

details.certificate: Digital Badge and Certificate of Completion
